zimbra_organization_delete_modal_content: Are you sure you want to delete the organisation?
zimbra_organization_delete_modal_message: There is at least one domain still linked to this organisation.
Please delete the linked domains before deleting your organisation.
zimbra_organization_delete_success_messa: Your deletion request has been submitted. It will be executed in a few moments.
zimbra_organization_delete_error_message: Unable to submit your deletion request. {{ error }}
